nodes.text: The Laerdocia system was a star system that was located within the Dalonbian sector, in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. The system was home to the sentient Laerdocian species.
The Laerdocia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-3.
